ref: 11137 *lōttha2 ʻ lump ʼ. 2. *lōdda -- . 3. *lōddha -- . 4. *lōnda -- . [Cf. *ladda -- 1, *lidda -- 3, *luṭṭa -- 2: see list s.v. *lakka -- 2. -- Cf. ʻ defective ʼ word -- group s.v. *lutta -- ]
H. lothī f. ʻ knotted club ʼ, lothṛā, lothṛhā, lothrā m. ʻ lump of flesh ʼ. -- For ʻ corpse ʼ words see *lōttha -- 1.
